    • signIn

      public boolean signIn(String username, String password)
      Checks if a username and password are valid. If the username and password are authenticated then the CurrentUser is set to the User with that username. If the database throws an InvalidCredentialsException then the method returns false.
      Specified by:
      signIn in interface AccessControl
      Parameters:
      username - the username being passed in by the User logging in.
      password - the password being passed in by the User logging in.
      Throws:
      InvalidCredentialsException - if the username and/or password are invalid.
